LootJunkie

LootJunkie was created to mimic the experience of opening Loot boxes in Overwatch. As of lately the website has also been expanded to support card packs in Hearthstone.

LootJunkie's goal is to maintain an up-to-date item database with as accurate odds as possible. Using community driven data LootJunkie succeeds in creating a fun and accurate loot box opening experience.

If you would like to get in contact with us please try our Twitter otherwise you can reach out via email.

Third party services

  • Hearthstone card database provided by HearthstoneJSON
  • Overwatch item database provided by Overwatch Item Tracker
